description: Number of standard paths of length n in composition poset.
references: F. Bergeron, M. Bousquet-Mélou and S. Dulucq, Standard paths in the composition poset, Ann. Sci. Math. Quebec, 19 (1995), no. 2, 139-151.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: F. Bergeron, M. Bousquet-Mélou and S. Dulucq, Standard paths in the composition poset
Index entries for sequences related to posets
formula: E.g.f.: exp(-x)/(cosh(x/sqrt(2)) - sqrt(2)sinh(x/sqrt(2)))^2.a(n) is asymptotic to n!(c1(n+1+c2)+c2)/((sqrt(2)c2)^n*c1^c1*c2^2) where c1=1+sqrt(2), c2=log(c1).G.f.: 1/Q(0), where Q(k) = 1 - x*(2*k+1) - x^2*(k+1)*(k+2)/2/Q(k+1) ; (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Sep 29 2013
author: _Simon Plouffe_
